The pure class interface. 
public class FormatSpace
  extends Format
This is the Format class for spaces that can be ignored at the beginning and end of a line. The space can have a width that is more than 1.

Author:
Jacob Wieland (ughosage@cs.tu-berlin.de)
See also:
